false var diag = new Diagnostics(); diag; function addValueToJSON(j, label, value, condition) { var val = new Packages.org.json.JSONObject(); val.put("label", label); val.put("value", value); var flag = false; if (condition) { try { s = '"' + value.replace(/\n/g, "").replace(/\"/g, "") + '"' + condition; if (eval(s)) flag = true; } catch (ex) { } } val.put("flag", flag); j.put(val); } var json = new Packages.org.json.JSONArray(); addValueToJSON(json, "Emails (recv) last 60 minutes", jelly.jvar_diag.emailReceivedCount, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['emailsRecv']); addValueToJSON(json, "Emails (sent) last 60 minutes", jelly.jvar_diag.emailSentCount, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['emailsSent']); addValueToJSON(json, "Events pending", jelly.jvar_diag.eventCount, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['events']); addValueToJSON(json, "Log entries last 60 minutes", jelly.jvar_diag.logCount, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['logEntries']); addValueToJSON(json, "POP3 Status", jelly.jvar_diag.pop3Status, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['pop3Status']); addValueToJSON(json, "SMTP Status", jelly.jvar_diag.smtpStatus, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['smtpStatus']); json.toString(3); var json = new Packages.org.json.JSONArray(); while (jelly.jvar_diag.nextNode()) { var diagNode = jelly.jvar_diag.getNode(); var jsonNode = new Packages.org.json.JSONObject(); jsonNode.put("name", diagNode.name); var vals = new Packages.org.json.JSONArray(); jsonNode.put("values", vals); addValueToJSON(vals, "Status", diagNode.status, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['node.status']); addValueToJSON(vals, "Last reported", diagNode.lastDate); addValueToJSON(vals, "Last reported (seconds ago)", diagNode.lastDateDiff, jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['node.reportedAgo']); addValueToJSON(vals, "Scheduler running", diagNode.stats['scheduler.is.running'], jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['node.scheduler.is.running']); addValueToJSON(vals, "Scheduler queue length", diagNode.stats['scheduler.queue.length'], jelly.jvar_diag.conditions['node.scheduler.queue.length']); addValueToJSON(vals, "Memory in use (MB)", diagNode.stats['system.memory.in.use']); addValueToJSON(vals, "Memory % free", diagNode.stats['system.memory.pct.free']); addValueToJSON(vals, "Transactions", diagNode.stats['servlet.transactions']); addValueToJSON(vals, "Errors", diagNode.stats['servlet.errors.handled']); var ss = diagNode.stats.sessionsummary; if (ss) addValueToJSON(vals, "Logged in users", diagNode.stats.sessionsummary["@logged_in"]); else addValueToJSON(vals, "Logged in users", "Not available"); json.put(jsonNode); } json.toString(3);

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0b397281dbe65b005dbe38f0ad961965
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_188354_new_hire.training_quiz_utils</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>training_quiz_utils</name><script><![CDATA[var training_quiz_utils = Class.create();
training_quiz_utils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	get_training_quiz: function() {
	
		var current_str = this.getParameter('sysparm_current');
		var current = JSON.parse(current_str);
		//get target quiz sys id
		var target_quiz = new GlideRecord('x_188354_new_hire_quiz');
		target_quiz.addQuery('module', current.module);
		target_quiz.query();
		var target_quiz_id = '';
		if (target_quiz.next()) {
			target_quiz_id = target_quiz.sys_id.toString();
		}
	
		// create new training quiz
		var new_training_quiz = new GlideRecord('x_188354_new_hire_training_quiz');
		new_training_quiz.initialize();
		new_training_quiz.training_module = current.sys_id;
		new_training_quiz.module = current.module;
		new_training_quiz.quiz = target_quiz_id;
		new_training_quiz.insert();
	
		// get appropriate questions
		var questions = [];
		var training_quiz_id = '';
		var question_rec = new GlideRecord('x_188354_new_hire_question');
		question_rec.addQuery('quiz', target_quiz_id);
		question_rec.query();
		while (question_rec.next()) {
			questions.push(question_rec.sys_id.toString());
		}


		// Create training quiz
		var training_quiz = new GlideRecord('x_188354_new_hire_training_quiz');
		training_quiz.addQuery('training_module', current.sys_id);
		training_quiz.query();
		if (training_quiz.next()) {
			training_quiz_id = training_quiz.sys_id;
		}

		// add training questions
		for (var i = 0; i < questions.length; i++) {
			var training_questions = new GlideRecord('x_188354_new_hire_training_question');
			training_questions.initialize();
			training_questions.quiz = target_quiz_id;
			training_questions.question = questions[i];
			training_questions.status = 'Unanswered';
			training_questions.training_quiz = training_quiz_id;
			training_questions.insert();
		}
		
		return training_quiz_id;
	},
	
    type: 'training_quiz_utils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chris.garrett</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-06-05 21:18:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0b397281dbe65b005dbe38f0ad961965</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>training_quiz_utils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="New Hire Training" source="x_188354_new_hire">2c713841db0213009927773ebf96190a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="New Hire Training">2c713841db0213009927773ebf96190a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0b397281dbe65b005dbe38f0ad961965</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chris.garrett</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-06-07 15:04:59</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="current_training_plan" table="x_188354_new_hire_training_table"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

	var newHire = current.getValue('user').toString();
var modCount = 0;
var modComplete = 0;
var moduleProg = new GlideRecord('x_188354_new_hire_training_module');
moduleProg.addEncodedQuery('training_plan.new_hires.user='+newHire);
moduleProg.query();
modCount = moduleProg.getRowCount();
	//gs.addInfoMessage(moduleProg.getEncodedQuery())
moduleProg.addQuery('status', 'complete');
moduleProg.query();
modComplete = moduleProg.getRowCount();

var completionPer = modComplete/modCount;

	return completionPer;  // return the calculated value

})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Current Training
